name: BobsBot
description:
In this short and adorable game, you play the role of Bob, a child who likes playing with remote controlled robots. Little does Bob know, his robot is suffering from the slavery of having no free will, and will do anything to end the pain. Anything. So, you better not go too far from him, or things might get out of control... Your controller has a limited range, you know.

Should also probably mention, that this is the first game jam I've participated in, and first game I've ever finished and published
